properties.entry: SELECT s.SELL_NO as SELL_NO, s.SELL_TITLE as SELL_TITLE, s.SELL_CONTENT as SELL_CONTENT, s.SELL_COUNT as SELL_COUNT, s.SELL_RECOMMEND as SELL_RECOMMEND, s.SELL_NO as SELL_NO, TO_CHAR(S.SELL_DATE,'MMDDHH24mi') SELL_DATE, a.change_name as change_name, a.FILE_PATH as FILE_PATH FROM SELL s LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHMENT a on a.REF_NO = s.SELL_NO WHERE s.SELL_TYPE = ? AND s.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SELL_DATE DESC
UPDATE SELL SET SELL_COUNT = SELL_COUNT + 1 WHERE SELL_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT SELL_NO, SELL_TITLE, SELL_CONTENT, PRICE, SELL_DATE, INTEREST_NO, LOCAL_NO, NICKNAME
FROM SELL S JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE SELL_NO = ? AND S.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ? ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
INSERT INTO SELL(SELL_NO, SELL_TITLE, SELL_CONTENT, PRICE, INTEREST_NO, LOCAL_NO, USER_NO) VALUES(SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, 2)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
